DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Events Domain Biospecimen Laboratory Internal Tracking Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The laboratory's internal tracking identification number.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Events Domain Biospecimen Laboratory Internal Tracking
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An events domain that documents biospecimen collection and storage information.:Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products._Happening or arising or located within some limits, or especially, within some surface._The act or process of following a person, animal, or object through space or time.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions.
